item.title: Broadband Access [Data Visualization]
item.description:
This week I used ggplot to create a map of broadband internet access across Louisiana, USA. I then used the ggiraph package to convert the map to html. Hover over each subdivision to view the percentage of people with access to broadband internet as of 2017. Code below plot. {"x":{"html":"

 Louisiana, USA
 
 
 Acces to Broadband Internet

item.title: Tate Art [Data Visualization]
item.description: #TidyTuesday dataset of the week is the art collection of Tate Art Museum. I made a visual of the number of acquisitions made by Tate by decade taking into account what decade the art was created.

Effects of Land Development on Water Resources of the Pinelands Region
item.description: Report detailing the extent to which water and water-related resources are modified by land development in the protected Pinelands region of New Jersey, USA.
